title: Exploring Texture Assets,  Surface Imperfections with DALL-E 2

media:group.media:title: Exploring Texture Assets,  Surface Imperfections with DALL-E 2
media:group.media:description:
Can you use DALL-E 2 to generate textures for 2D/3D assets?  Also, how can we use it as a surface imperfections reference to improve the accuracy and photorealism of our 3D models?
